alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Fergus County below 4500ft; Hill County; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern High Plains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 9:55PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of eastern Pondera, northern Meagher, northwestern Judith Basin, southern Liberty, western Fergus, southern Toole, east central Teton, southwestern Hill, Chouteau and eastern Cascade Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 954 PM MDT, Doppler radar was a strong outflow wind boundary along a line extending from near Valier to 12 miles northeast of Brady to 14 miles northwest of Highwood to 22 miles south of Belt. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Conrad, Fort Benton, Stanford, Belt, Valier, Geraldine, Lothair, The Knees, Highwood, Geyser, Carter, Floweree, Tiber Dam, Shonkin, Loma, Kenilworth, Virgelle, Raynesford, and Monarch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
